name: VacuumBelts
title: Vacuum Belts
author: FlipskiZ
description:
A new late-game vacuum belt tier that transports items very quickly, 3x as fast as express belts.

The drawback of these belts is that you can't directly connect them to other belts, nor have inserters be able to interact with them. A splitter is required as an intermediary first.

The mod also includes custom settings making it possible to use this mod to just experiment with custom belts.
